subject: Nascar Nextel Cup Series
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Carl Edwards won the race and climbed into third place in the standings, but perhaps only temporarily as his Ford failed the postrace inspection because its right rear was found to be too low.
snippet: Carl Edwards won the race and climbed into third place in the standings, but perhaps only temporarily as his Ford failed the postrace inspection because its right rear was found to be too low.
